item.title: [NOT] Welcome to /biz/ - Business & Finance — 1 replies
item.content:encoded:
[NOT] Welcome to /biz/ - Business & Finance

Open thread • Replies: 1 • Updated: 2025-04-25 20:50 UTC

OP

This board is for the discussion of topics related to business, economics, financial markets, securities, currencies (including cryptocurrencies), commodities, etc -- as well as topics relating to starting and running a business.

Discussions of government policy must be strictly limited to economic policies (fiscal and monetary). Discussions of a political nature should be posted on >>>/pol/. Global Rule 3 is also obviously in effect.

Note: /biz/ is NOT a place for ADVERTISING or SOLICITING. Do NOT use it to promote your business, ventures, or anything you may have an interest in. Anything that looks remotely like advertising or soliciting will be removed. Begging/asking (including tipping) for cryptocurrencies or asking for money/capital is also strictly forbidden.

Latest replies

60278993
Check the catalog before posting a new thread!Reply to existing threads about a topic instead of starting a new one. Mods will delete obvious duplicate threads and spam without notice.

I'm not familiar with crossmark wallet.
https://www.xrptoolkit.com/connect-wallet
XRP Toolkit lists the following compatible wallets on its site:
>Bitfrost Wallet
>Ledger Device
>Xaman Wallet
>D'Cent Wallet
>Keystone
>Cobo Vault

Beside those, it also gives the option to enter an address, with this note:
>View your account or prepare transactions to be signed by another account, for example an account set as regular key.
Based on the wording here, it doesn't sound like you'd be able to actually sign transactions this way.
Read only basically; unless I'm misunderstanding the wording here.

If you want to connect and interact with XRP Toolkit, then you'll need to limit yourself to the above listed choices.

item.title: [BEND BREAK FEAR FOLD NOT] Calling all Stackers. Calling all Stackers! — 8 replies
item.content:encoded:
[BEND BREAK FEAR FOLD NOT] Calling all Stackers. Calling all Stackers!

Open thread • Replies: 8 • Updated: 2026-02-15 16:36 UTC

OP

It doesnt matter what you stack. Silver, gold, bitcoin, xrp, platinum, copper.
The next 9 days will represent a battlefield. An ancient sacred battlefield that will finally declare a victor.
Over the next 9 days a series of tactical and deliberate decisions will be made by both bankers and stackers, and for the first time in history we are going to bring the fight to them.
Using their own weapon against them.
Or at least what they think is a weapon.
It will actually be a signal.
It will be our signal to attack, our definitive signal to stack. Stack like you never fucking stacked before. Like your fucking life depends on it. Because it does.
The signal will be loud and bright blood red. They will utilize a series of/or a single soul crushing tamp, to crush and shake and violently remove easily frightened holders of our precious silver.

YOU WILL NOT BREAK. YOU WILL NOT FOLD. YOU WILL NOT BEND TO (((THEIR))) WILL.YOU WILL NOT YIELD. YOU WILL NOT SHOW THEM FEAR.

TOGETHER WE WILL STACK.

/part1

Latest replies

61857210
Let me break free of this npc pony show built on bad money

61857181

61857160
Let What is this gay shit?

61857063
Year of the Fire Horse

Lets go

61857060
>>61857051
yea but its mostly for people who could use a nice little discount

61857056
>>61857042

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZqJ7T8sQ_pM

61857051
I agree OP, the issue is if silver drops below 50, even all the way down to 1 dollar, or even 0.01cents, gold going below 1000, there won't be any physical left due to it being all sold out.

The time to buy was yesterday, and the time to buy is now. The price doesn't matter, just fucking buy silver, buy gold.

Paper silver, paper gold, and the u.s dollar are fake. It's going to do a complete disconnect from physical, and physical's value will be revealed.

61857044
They could attack once. They could attack twice. If they attack twice, the first attack could happen at open on tuesday and the second on friday. If they attack once it will happen midnight fri 20th.
That will be their death.
If it happens midnight on friday our counter attack will begin in that moment. We will crash every website from apmex all the way to jmbullion and everything in between.
We have reinforcements coming from both the east and the west.
Paper stackers will ride in from the West shining the light of taking silver delivery.
Our brethren in China will be riding in from the East fat and happy from their new year celebrations.
We will be in the trenches and i have to admit its gonna get ugly.
Some of you may run out of snacks.
But our sacrifices will ring out across the land and through time.

I will lead this charge and post my own purchase receipts the moment they turn the line red.
Ride with me gentlemen. Not for me. Not for yourselves. BUT FOR OUR KIDS AND THEIR KIDS
TAKE WHAT YOU CAN
GIVE NOTHING BACK

OPERATION FIREHORSE has begun.
